ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.java.util 
);
with(javaImport){
    let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b");
    let ALGORITHM = "DES"; 
    let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding";
    let CHARSET = "utf-8";
    let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN");


function decode(data){
let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes());
let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks);
let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM);
let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET));
cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv);
return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET);

}
}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/premier/)){
	result=java.getString(".read-content@html")
	}else{
		toc=java.getElements('.chaw_c li a')
		urls=[]
		toc.forEach(c=>{
			url="https://www.onsitemanagementllc.com"+String(c.attr("href"))
			if(!urls.includes(url)){
				urls.push(url)
				}
			})
		results=java.ajaxAll(urls)
		txt=""
		results.forEach(r=>{
			r=r.body()
			txt+=java.getString(".read-content@html",r)
			})
			result=txt
		}
result
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
-<js>
result=java.getElements(`#nr:has(h3 a:matches(${book.name}))`)
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]
if(result.length==1&&page=="1"){
	uri=result[0].select("h3 a").attr("href")
	toc=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax("https://www.onsitemanagementllc.com"+uri))
	result=toc.select(".chaw_c li")
	result.sort((a,b)=>String(b).localeCompare(String(a)))
	java.log(result)
	}
result
</js>

result = source.key + next;
result;
</js>

author = java.getString('[property="og:novel:author"]@content');

img = java.getString('[property="og:image"]@content');

    for (i in $) {
        y += '\nâ¤åºå·ğŸ”º' + i + 'ğŸ”»ã€' + $[i].text() + 'ã€‘\næºåœ°å€ï¼š'+`https://www.juxiaoshuo.net/post/novel/toc?novelId=${pi}&novelFromId=${$[i].attr("value")},{"method": "POST"}`;
    }
    info += y;
}
let bookUrlz = `https://www.juxiaoshuo.net/post/novel/toc?novelId=${pi}&novelFromId=${$[x].attr("value")},{"method": "POST"}`;
if (!name || !author || !kind || !last || !img || !info) {
    java.toast("âš ï¸ä¹¦ç±ä¿¡æ¯è§£æå¤±è´¥ï¼Œå¯èƒ½æ˜¯ç½‘ç»œé—®é¢˜æˆ–ç½‘é¡µé“¾æ¥ä¸åˆæ³•ã€‚è¯·æ£€æŸ¥ç½‘é¡µé“¾æ¥æˆ–ç¨åé‡è¯•ã€‚");
}

data = {

    author: author,
    kind: kind,
    last: last,
    img: img,
    info: info,
    bookUrl: bookUrlz
};

// åºåˆ—åŒ–ä¸ºJSONæ ¼å¼
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
result = JSON.parse(result)
resultlength = result.length
for (var i=0; i<resultlength; resultlength--){
 let chapter = JSON.parse(java.ajax("https://api.kadokado.com.tw/v2/collection/withIsPurchased?publishedOnly=true&collectionId=" + result[resultlength - 1]["id"].match(/\d+/)[0]))
 Array.prototype.splice.apply(result, [resultlength, 0].concat(chapter))
 }
for (var i = 0; i < result.length; i++) {
  if (!isNaN(result[i].id)) {
  result[i].id = "https://api.kadokado.com.tw/v2/chapter/" + result[i].id
  } else {
  result[i].id = ""
  }
 if (result[i].hasOwnProperty('free')) {
 result[i].free = !result[i].free
 }
}
result = result
